title: Mark Judson For Congress
description:
Mark Judson is tweeting up a storm about Joe Rogan, though he's never listened to one second of his show. He's also running from Congress and Kirk is officially endorsing this lunatic (00:22:30). Joe Rogan is at risk of being cancelled after a compilation of him using a racial slur is released over the weekend (00:03:00). Securing Fred "Boom Boom" Couples as a guest has reached its boiling point (00:44:00). Dave Portnoy goes toe-to-toe with 3 nobodies and finds a way to throw his own employee under the bus (00:53:45). Sirius radio host Mark Lye was fired after his WNBA comments (01:07:00). Kirk announces 5 nights in 5 states for late August (01:12:00).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
